page.title: 14Lifestyles in the area.
page.content: Sutton has a large department store, specialist shops, banks, employment agenciec, insurance companies, offices D.H.S.S. restaurants and pubs.These provide work for many local residents. Entertainment facilities are limited, except for a selection of pubs, such as The Angel and the Cricketers, or various pizza houses such as Pizza Hut, Pizza Garden and Pastifico which has just opened, or McDonalds. There is one cinema in the nearby town centre and a bingo hall at Rose Hill. A small survey was carried out about people's eating and drinking places. Of the people interviewed, a small majority said the sometimes went out to eat. A majority went to public houses and thought it a good idea for pubs to sell food.A minority thought that smoking should be allowed in eating places.
